function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of UVGI system at higher air stream velocities","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne bacteria culturability and fungal growth","Mitigation":"Control air stream velocities to ensure UVGI system effectiveness","Technologies":"Velocity control mechanisms in HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in high-velocity areas","Owner":"HVAC system managers"},{"Description":"Accumulation of 'dead' pathogens on contact surface reducing effectiveness of PCO method","Impact":"Reduced germicidal effect and potential build-up of pathogens in the indoor environment","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of PCO unit, enhancement of germicidal effect through doping TiO2 with Ag ions","Technologies":"Cleaning protocols, TiO2 doping technology","People":"HVAC system technicians, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Formation of secondary chemical species reducing indoor air quality","Impact":"Decreased indoor air quality and potential health risks to building occupants","Mitigation":"Further research on pathogen inactivation by PCO, development of secondary chemical species filtration systems","Technologies":"Research and development, chemical species filtration technology","People":"HVAC system researchers, building health and safety teams","Owner":"Research institutions, building management"}]}
